Pdef Java Releases
------------------

### 1.2.0 (2014-02-11)
- Simpler RPC, #24.

### 1.1.2 (2014-01-16)
- Parsing booleans from 1/0, #23.

### 1.1.1 (2014-01-14)
- Invoker in RpcHandler, #22.
- Polymorphic method in test interfaces, #21.

### 1.1.0 (2013-12-22)
- Interface inheritance, fixed #19.
- New generator CLI, fixed #20.

### 1.0.0 (2013-12-19)
- Initial release.
